rooms.description: Large open space with traditional Kerala-style wooden beams and tiled flooring. Incorporates Vastu guidelines by orienting the entrance towards the east for positive energy flow, while still accommodating a West-facing plot.
Modern kitchen integrated with traditional elements such as stone countertops and local wood cabinets. Positioned adjacent to the living area to ensure ease of access for family members.
Open dining space adjacent to the kitchen, designed for communal meals with traditional Kerala motifs and Vastu principles ensuring proper energy distribution.
Spacious bedroom featuring a private balcony for fresh air, aligned with north-east direction per Vastu for tranquility. Includes built-in wardrobe and traditional Kerala-style ceiling fans.
Additional sleeping area designed for joint family members; maintains a balance with natural light using large windows as per Vastu guidelines.

Entertainment zone integrated within the living area, featuring soundproof walls and comfortable seating. Utilizes traditional Kerala aesthetic elements while ensuring acoustic design meets modern standards.
Dedicated workspace designed for quiet and concentration with natural light from east-facing windows, adhering to Vastu principles.
Well-planned bathroom with traditional Kerala-style fixtures and sufficient ventilation in line with Vastu guidelines.
Storage area for cleaning supplies, kitchen utensils, and other household items, designed to maintain cleanliness as per traditional practices.

openings.details: Traditional wooden door with intricate carvings; aligned with Vastu for positive energy despite a West-facing plot, ensuring that the main entry faces sunlight in the morning.
Large windows to promote natural lighting and ventilation; designed per Vastu principles.
Optimized for maximum natural light and energy flow according to Vastu guidelines.
Automated door with sufficient clearance; designed in keeping with the West-facing plot layout.
